text: Udagama is a village in Sri Lanka. Udagama may also refer to the following Sri Lankan places or people ;Villages *Ampitiya Udagama *Ankumbura Udagama *Haputale Udagama *Tembiligala Udagama *Udagama, Eastern Province *Udagama Pallegama *Uduwela Udagama *Vilana Udagama ;Other *Deepika Udagama, Sri Lankan lawyer *Udagama Kanda, a mountain
title: Udagama (disambiguation)
